text: Thomas Turner was a Scottish footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==Career== Turner played club football for Arthurlie, and made one appearance for Scotland in 1884. He was later active as a referee, before emigrating to Australia. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Arthurlie F.C. players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Year of death missing Category:Place of death missing
title: Thomas Turner (footballer)
